children.markdown:
[![](https://i0.wp.com/www.onemanandhisblog.com/content/images/2007/03/408782592_8eeb3bc25a.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/408782592/ "photo sharing") [A Gig At QMW circa 1992](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/408782592/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
I’ve recently acquired a new scanner, which can handle film and negative scanning. This is a direct scan from some black & white negatives taken while I was at university at the early 90s. It was shot on Ilford HP5 Film. I haven’t been able to identify the band yet. Expect quite a few images like this over the weekend…
